name: RealPlay Puzzlesphere
summary:
Explore a world full of challenging puzzles with Realplay Puzzlesphere for the Playstation 2. This engaging game offers a collection of diverse and intriguing puzzles that will put your brain to work. Solve challenging riddles, test your logic and improve your thinking skills while experiencing immersive gameplay. Dive into the fun of brain-teasing challenges and enjoy hours of entertainment with this fascinating puzzle game.

36 stunning courses across 6 environments. Practice, Arcade, Time Trial and 2-4 Play Time Attack modes.

The game was released with a specific wireless sphere controller.
